verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of Y'hoyakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> came this word <S%H1697><s%> unto Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

And command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them to say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto their masters <S%H113><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; Thus shall ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto your masters <S%H113><s%>;

I have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, the man <S%H120><s%> and the beast <S%H929><s%> that are upon <S%H6440><s%> the ground <S%H776><s%>, by my great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by my outstretched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it unto whom it seemed <S%H5869><s%> meet <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me.

And now have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all these lands <S%H776><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him also to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

And all nations <S%H1471><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him, and his son <S%H1121><s%>, and his son's <S%H1121><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, until the very time <S%H6256><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and then many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> themselves of him.

And it shall come to pass, that the nation <S%H1471><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> which will not serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the same Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and that will not put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, that nation <S%H1471><s%> will I punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and with the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, until I have consumed <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them by his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Therefore hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not ye to your prophets <S%H5030><s%>, nor to your diviners <S%H7080><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, nor to your dreamers <S%H2472><s%>, nor to your enchanters <S%H6049><s%> <S%H8781><s%>, nor to your sorcerers <S%H3786><s%>, which speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>:

For they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> unto you, to remove you far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from your land <S%H127><s%>; and that I should drive you out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and ye should perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

But the nations <S%H1471><s%> that bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him, those will I let remain still <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall till <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein.

I spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> also to TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> according to all these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> your necks <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him and his people <S%H5971><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

Why will ye die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, thou and thy people <S%H5971><s%>, by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> against the nation <S%H1471><s%> that will not serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> ?

Therefore hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not unto the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>: for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> unto you.

For I have not sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, yet they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>; that I might drive you out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and that ye might perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, ye, and the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto you.

Also I spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and to all this people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not to the words <S%H1697><s%> of your prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall now shortly <S%H4120><s%> be brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8716><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%>: for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> unto you.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not unto them; serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: wherefore should this city <S%H5892><s%> be laid waste <S%H2723><s%> ?

But if they be prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and if the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with them, let them now make intercession <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, that the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which are left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and at Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> concerning the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and concerning the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and concerning the bases <S%H4350><s%>, and concerning the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that remain <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>,

Which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, when he carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Y'khanyah-yahu <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hoyakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> from Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and all the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>;

Yea, thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, concerning the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that remain <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>;

They shall be carried <S%H935><s%> <S%H8714><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and there shall they be until the day <S%H3117><s%> that I visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; then will I bring <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them up, and restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them to this place <S%H4725><s%>.
